attributes.value: Values family
Finds maintaining decorum a silly, fumbling waste of time
Finds those that deny their impulses somewhat stiff
Values good craftsmanship
Sees sacrifice as wasteful and foolish
Sees competition as reasonably important
Finds nature somewhat disturbing
Can easily fall in love or develop positive sentiments
Never becomes angry
Is often nervous
Is unfriendly and disagreeable
Is quite polite
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Has an active sense of humor
Has an overinflated sense of self-worth
Generally finds herself quite hopeful about the future
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Is frustratingly sloppy and careless with every task she sets to carry out
Often finds herself changing her mind to agree with somebody else
Doesn't generally think before acting
Good creativity
A feel for music
A good feel for social relationships
